statements: DELETE FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_income > 50000 AND affordability_index < 4.5;
DELETE FROM housing_affordability_indexes WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' AND number_of_bedrooms = 2;
DELETE FROM demographic_data WHERE neighborhood = 'Suburb' AND median_income < 50000;
DELETE FROM Neighborhoods WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM HousingAffordability WHERE housing_price > 100000 AND affordability_index < 1.5;
DELETE FROM HousingInventory WHERE num_bedrooms > 3 AND square_footage < 2000;
